metadata.title: CVE-2020-7788 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: This affects the package ini before 1.3.6. If an attacker submits amalicious INI file to an application that parses it with ini.parse, theywill pollute the prototype on the application. This can be exploitedfurther depending on the context.

criterions.comment: node-ini: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
